title: POCO M4 Pro (Cool Blue, 64 GB)  (6 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, 33W Power Adapter, USB Type A-C Cable, Sim Ejector Tool, Transparent Case, Pre-Applied Screen Protector, User Guide, Warranty Card
product_specification.Sound Enhancements: Dual Stereo Speakers, Hi Res Audio Certified for Headphones
product_specification.Other Display Features: Aspect Ratio: 20:9, In-Cell AMOLED Dot Display with 90Hz Refresh Rate, Contrast Ratio: 4500000:1, NTSC Ratio: Supports DCI-P3 Color Gamut, Screen Mirror/ Cast: Yes
product_specification.Operating Frequency: 4G FDD LTE: B1/B3/B5/B8, 4G TDD LTE: B40/B41, 3G WCDMA: B1/B2/B5/B8, 2G GSM: 850/900/1800/1900 MHz
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: Triple Camera Setup: 64MP Main Camera (f/1.8 Aperture, Pixel Size: 0.7um, (4-in-1: 16MP, 1.4um)) + 8MP Ultra Wide Camera (f/2.2 Aperture, Pixel Size: 1.0um, FOV: 118 Degree) + 2MP Macro Camera, Phase Detection Auto Focus, Camera Feature: HDR, AI Portrait Mode, Pro Mode, AI Scene Detection, Night Mode, Short Video, Slow Motion, Time Lapse, Panorama, AI Watermark, Pro Color, Timed Burst, Ultra Wide Mode, Macro Mode
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 16MP Camera Setup: (f/2.45 Aperture, Pixel Size: 1.0um), Camera Feature: HDR, AI Portrait Mode, Screen Flash, Selfie Timer, Portrait Selfies, Palm shutter
product_specification.Video Recording Resolution: Rear Camera: 1080p (at 30 fps) | Front Camera: 1080p (at 30 fps)
product_specification.Sensors: Ambient Light Sensor, Proximity Sensor, E-Compass, Accelerometer, Gyroscope, Fingerprint Scanner
product_specification.Other Features: Fingerprint Scanner Position: Side Mounted (Power Key), Face Unlock, Dual App Support, 33W MMT Fast Charging, Standby Time (4G): 660 Hours, Corning Gorilla Glass 3. Turbo RAM: 1 GB, UFS 2.2, IR Blaster, Handset Body: Polycarbonate Back
product_specification.Warranty Summary: One Year for Handset, 6 Months for Accessories

product_description.Intuitive Design: The POCO M4 Pro has a 16.33 cm (6.43) SuperAMOLED screen with a 90 Hz refresh rate and a touch sampling rate of 180 Hz that helps in the smooth operation of this phone. With dazzling colours and an extensive DCI P3 colour spectrum, the display gives an incredible viewing experience. It functions seamlessly while playing games, browsing the internet, and watching movies. Furthermore, 1000 nits of peak brightness provide a pleasant vision even in the scorching sunlight.
product_description.Picture Perfect: This phone has a triple camera configuration, that includes a 64 MP primary camera and an 8 MP Ultra-wide camera with a 118-degree field of vision, making it an ideal companion for photography enthusiasts, especially content developers. It also boasts a 16 MP front camera to suffice your selfie obsession.
product_description.Lightweight Rockstar: Weighing around 179.5 g and featuring an elegantly designed rear that feels terrific in the hand this POCO M4 Pro features a compact and intuitive design that prevents fingerprints and smudges.
product_description.Powerful Processor: This gadget is equipped with a Helio G96 processor with 6 GB of RAM and 64 GB of internal memory, which works in conjunction with UFS 2.2 WriteBooster and Liquid Cooling Technology to provide outstanding performance for all of your daily tasks whilst maintaining the device at an optimal temperature. Furthermore, This phone comes with the Turbo RAM feature, which turns idle memory into RAM for efficient productivity.
product_description.Efficient Battery: This POCO M4 Pro offers a 5000 mAh battery that can last up to two days. It has 33 W Fast Charging with MMT technology, which allows you to charge your phone completely in about 61 minutes without overheating it.

review:
Phone is ok for it's price 👌
I saw some negative reviews about the camera. But i felt cam is ok. Not excellent one. But it's a good one.
Display is excellent 👌
Battery also best, but it took 81 min. to get fully charged. That's ok 😊
Performance is very impressive 👌
I am sharing some Sample photos 😊

Overall a Good phone at this price.* Samoled display with 90Hz refresh rate. *Dual stereo speakers. *A decent battery life. But needed camera module improvement, i hope it may be improved after system update😊😊😊
Good display and beast camera front and back... Good performance and faster fingerprint..size and cool structure...worth penny😍

Today got the delivery of the phone... After using for 6 hours I am writing my experience....
Display of this phone is quite ok type.. Not much vibrant like others AMOLED display phone....
Performance is good after moderate use it's getting somehow heated......
Camera performance of this phone is below average... Background blur is completely unnatural.. Edge detection is poor... Failed to capture dynamic range properly..... Macro photo is pathetic.......
Phone is light weight....... And handy in size.....
Charging speed of this phone is good....
Gaming experience of this phone is quite decent...
Badly needed software optimization in phone's software....
Request poco authority, kind upgrade phone software to improve optimization in camera, performance etc....
Battery performance of this phone is not upto the mark because of its 12nm processor....
My suggestions, don't go for this 4g phone wasting money in the name of Amoled display and 64mp camera... Rather go other brands... Previously I used poco m2pro... Far better than that device...
........PHONE Without OPTIMIZATION....

Where to start with more cons than pros of the phone.

On paper the specs are great but reality wise it is not meeting expectations.

Coming from poco m2 pro phone i had a good faith on poco phone but m4 pro is utterly disappointed.

Here is the list from my experience

1. Screen & display is ok but i don't find anything great with amoled screen
2. Lot of bloat ware some of them are hard to remove. for e.g. google pay, gallery app etc
3. Not a gamer so can't comment on the performance.
4. Camera is bad. Very bad and even in day light lot of noise in the picture.
5. Speakers are worse. Even though it says dual stereo speakers but performance wise keeping on high volume it is low and also not having clarity with tones. Literally I need to keep the phone close to hear while talking to someone.
6. Battery is decent
7. Didn't find heavy compared to m2 pro but didn't feel grippy without use case. Felt slippery without using the case provided.
8. Color is bit darker compared with poco m4 pro 5g even though both are mentioned cool blue.
9. Software wise i found even issues for e.g. when i set app to run in background but still the app is closed after some time.I play music all night while sleeping which is quite annoying.

Delivery was good but experience with flipkart customer service team is bit of nightmare this time :(

Will keep update further more about the phone performance and also with once gcam app installed with comparison with stock one.

For the price spent its not at all worth. I suggest don't buy this poco at all.

I hope flipkart team wont modify my rating and reviews.

First 5 stars only for the fastest delivery I have ever got from Flipkart.
Second The phone design is like the most amazing design very different.
Third The phone comes in affordable price.
Fourth and on the TOP is the phones display which extremely superb.

The best one ever.. fantastic features with low cost
Battery 33W Fast charging 5000mAh - 👌🏻
Camera 64MP - 👍
AMOLED display - 🤩
Love it 🥳🥳🥳
Thank you 😊 Flipkart 👌🏻

Hi I am writing this review after using a 5 days. While using very first day I have not got proper battery backup, but after 2 days phone internally got settled and giving good battery backup. If u r a heavy user also it will give u one day battery.
Net charging 33watt charger is really amazing, it is charging the 1hr - 1hr 5min for full charging
Camera : in this main camera 64 mp camera, but after I have taken some pictures I observe it is not performing much well and even I am not feeling it is 64mp. After enabling AI feature in camera it improved lot more, but still require so much improvement from software side I am feeling it personally. Remaining 2 back cameras, I am not talking about these because I am not using these cameras mostly. And front camera also not upto the mark it need to perform much more I am thinking here also due to software problem.
Sterio speakers: these sterio speakers are not loud enough and even not performing like single speaker and the sound also not even in both speaker compare with bottom speaker head speaker little lesser sound output.
Processor g96 is decent processer and is handling all type games good and well as budget considering.
Over all phone look and in hand feel is very good and feeling lite weight in hand and stilish back design attracting lot more.

And finally I am telling it is a good battery phone with decent performance and good look and need little more software optimisation.
My Best Purchase and Overall Satisfied, Excellent Amoled Display, Stereo Speakers and Best Performance. One of the Best Device in the Price range, Can Proceed without any doubts.

The entire smartphone experience is built around its great AMOLED display and all the supporting features, from a decent camera to great battery life all add up to the general use cases of a smartphone. When it comes to those features, you will not find a better value in the market

pros.5000 mAh Battery: The 5000 mAh battery and 33W charger combination allows the phone to get charged up within 61 minutes and give a long lasting backup.
pros.16.33 cm (6.43) Super AMOLED display: The super AMOLED display and 90hz refresh rate ensures an incredible viewing experience. It has dazzling and rich colors to enhance its display.
pros.Performance: The octa core Mediatek Helio G96 gives good performance as well as a smooth gaming experience.

cons.Camera: The triple rear camera setup and 16MP front camera is of average quality. Not a recommended purchase for camera lovers.

summary.verdict: The POCO M4 Pro is a good mid range buy with amazing battery and performance. Not a recommended buy for camera lovers.
summary.Additional Information: Side mounted fingerprint, MIUI 13 based on Android 11, Supports Volte wifi.
